statements: DELETE FROM Transportation_Options WHERE price > 100 AND available_seats < 50;
DELETE FROM Train WHERE train_id = 101 AND departure_city = 'New York'
DELETE FROM Bus WHERE bus_id = 50 AND destination_city = 'Boston'
DELETE FROM rental_cars WHERE rental_location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM trains WHERE train_id = 100 AND departure_station = 'New York' AND arrival_station = 'Chicago';
DELETE FROM rental_cars WHERE car_id = 500 AND rental_location = 'Los Angeles' AND return_location = 'San Francisco';
